titleStmt.title: Exercitations and meditations upon some texts of Holy Scripture and most in Scripture-phrase and expression. By Samuel Thomsonn, M.A. and Doctor of Physick; formerly student in Magdalen-Hall in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Thomsonn, Samuel, b. 1643?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. Maxwell, for Edw. Brewster at the sign of the Crane in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With eight preliminary contents leaves and a preliminary advertisement leaf.
Fourteen exercitations, each with caption title; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library..

place.placeName: the sign of the Crane in St. Paul's Church-yard
